channel.title: [317 - DELTA] Help with total level [Rep++]
channel.description:
[center]Okay so when a player clicks to view his levels he gets this: [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2ld7wk0.png[/img]
If anyone can tell me how to change the "Kills" to "Total Level" and add their total level (All skill levels added up.) I think the max is 2079.
Rep++ for any help! [/center]

item.title: [317 - DELTA] Help with total level [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Whether or not it attracts more people to the post is irrelevant. People shouldn’t help only when they know they’re receiving compensation.

Search for “Kills:” in your server source. All you would need to know is change it to “Total Level” and then get/calc the sum of your levels

int sum = 0;
for (int i = 0; i < skills.length; i++) {
    sum += skills[i].level;
}

Or something. I don’t remember how wL based servers store the levels.

Read full topic

item.title: [317 - DELTA] Help with total level [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

Why not? That’s stupid.
Even if I didn’t advertise that I was offering a rep and someone helped me, I would rep+ them.
Offering a rep also attracts more people to look at this post.

Also,

[b]mista pnut[/b]

textHandler.java

Code (Java): [Select]
c.sendQuest("Total Lvl: “+c.total+” ", 3984);

That didn’t fix it.

I found the kills in my client.java but i’m not sure how to make it say your total level. (All your levels added up.)

Read full topic

item.title: [317 - DELTA] Help with total level [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

  1. You’ve been here long enough to know to not to offer rep.
  2. It’s probably set server-side, so look for the static text.

Read full topic
